data.name: Fishing Planet: Grand Smallie's Pack
data.detailed_description:
Oh boy, we sure love a good fish fight with big bad Bass! And when the Bass is Smallmouth - the battle can take some fiercely unexpected turns! Smallies are angry and ferocious opponents that fight to their last breath - that’s why we love ‘em! And since the devil is in the details, even minor tackle alterations can make the world of a difference when it comes to landing a Smallmouth!
Grand Smallie's Pack is a limited edition exclusive DLC created with the subtle art of Smallmouth Bass fishing in mind, to give you all top notch combat-mode tackle that’ll help you achieve a Champion performance!
Complete with exclusive Tournament-level tackle, Grand Smallie's Pack includes powerful Smallmouth combating weapons, like the GSC BassFinder™ pro casting rods and the super muscular GSC DynaSwirl™ casting reels, along with the limited collectible goodies like the super tough GSC OmniCase™ rod case, the handy GSC GoodyBox™ lure box and of course the lucky-streak GSC Buffer™ fishing jacket! You also get a whole bundle of goodies including all the terminal tackle, equipment and licenses you need to enjoy your Smallie fights, regardless of whether or not you’ll choose to compete in the Smallmouth fishing Tournament! But if you do - rest assured, with Grand Smallie’s Pack you’ll be armed to the teeth and fully prepared to give your very best fishing performance! Only question is, do you have the Champion skills?

Grand Smallie's Pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS - use your Credits to purchase new tackle, pay for fishing trips, repairs and any other in-game expenses. Spend your credits wisely!
* 20 BAITCOINS - use to purchase certain fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
* 7 DAYS OF PREMIUM ACCOUNT Enjoy seven days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to Experience and Credits earned for every fish you catch! In addition, you get the opportunity to rent a kayak with a 50% discount! You also get the privilege of free registration in Competitions and the advantage of using free Forward Time function twice as often!
* 35 Storage Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* GSC BassFinder™ 7' 3" (220) - Length: 7' 3" (2.2 m); Lure Weight: 1/2–1 1/2 Oz. (14-42 g); Power: Medium; Line Weight: 6.5–19 Lb. (3-8.5 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 1; Guides: 9
* GSC BassFinder™ 8' 10" (270) - Length: 8' 10" (2.7 m); Lure Weight: 1/2–1 1/2 Oz. (14-42 g); Power: Medium; Line Weight: 6.5–20 Lb. (3-9 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 1; Guides: 9
Reels:
* GSC DynaSwirl™ 2500 S - Ratio: 7.3:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 8/100 (0.25/100), braid 10/125 (0.2/125); Max Drag: 17.6 Lb. (8 kg)
* GSC DynaSwirl™ 2500 P - Ratio: 6.4:1; Recovery: 27.5" (70 cm); Capacity: mono 8/100 (0.25/100), braid 10/125 (0.2/125); Max Drag: 18.7 Lb. (8.5 kg)

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines:
Mono .014" (0.35 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 16 Lb. (7.2 kg)
Braid .0085" (0.22 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 17 Lb. (7.7 kg)
* Bass Jigs: Bass Jig 1 Oz. (28 g), #4/0 (x2); Bass Jig 1 Oz. (28 g), #2/0 (x2)
* Spinnerbaits: Spinnerbait 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #2/0 (x2); Spinnerbait 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #3/0 (x2); Spinnerbait 1 Oz. (28g), #4/0 (x2)
* Jig Heads: JigHead 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #2/0; JigHead 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #3/0; JigHead 6/7 Oz. (25 g), #4/0
* Worms: Worm 5" (12.5 cm) (x2); Worm 3" (7 cm) (x2)
* Crayfish: Nymphes 3" (7.5 cm) (x4)
* Crankbaits: Crankbait 3 ft. (1 m), #3/0; Crankbait 6 ft. (2 m), #3/0
* TopWater Lures: Walker 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #3/0; Popper 1/2 Oz (14 g), #2/0

EQUIPMENT
* FishFort XS Keepnet - Max Single Fish Weight: 22 Lb. (10 kg); Total Fish Weight: 154 Lb. (70 kg); Fish-Friendly: yes
* GSC OmniCase™ Rod Case - Rods: 2; Reels: 2
* GSC GoodyBox™ Lure Box - Tackles: 20; Lines: 2; Reels: 1
* GSC Buffer™ Waist Coat - Tackles: 15; Lines: 2

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
* Advanced Oregon License
* Advanced North Carolina License
* Advanced California License
* Advanced Michigan License

data.short_description: Grand Smallie's Pack is a limited edition exclusive Pack created with the subtle art of Smallmouth Bass fishing in mind, to give you all top notch combat-mode tackle that’ll help you achieve a Champion performance!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
